title: Success!
author: JGray
text:
My apologies for not having this up earlier in the day. I had meant to post it this morning but the wifi at the campground I'm staying in seemed to take exception to me uploading the comic.

For those of you reading this in the States (or for US citizens abroad) happy 4th of July! I hope your holiday was fun and safe.

Tomorrow I'll be back home and I'm going to be making it a priority to start doing more updates and special stuff with my Patreon this summer.

Enjoy your evening!

See you Thursday.
